name: Sjcx-tipbot
tagline: Social tipping system for the Storj community
body:
#Sjcx-tipbot


Tip anyone with SJCX, the coin used in http://storj.io/. For security and lower server demands there is no bitcoin/counterparty node on the server. All the blockchain information is collected from blockchain.info and blockscan.com. All withdrawal requests are downloaded and handled on a separate system. Another benefit is that there is no BTC fee for tips.

###Currently Supported Platforms
+    Twitter
+    Reddit
+    IRC
+    Slack

###Dependencies
1. MongoDB
2. Node.js
3. bitcoind
4. counterpartyd

###Install
```
git clone
cd sjcx-tipbot
npm install
Enter your bot credentials in config.js
node app.js
```

###Configuring the bots
**Reddit** - To configure the reddit bot you need 2 things: 

1. A Reddit Account
2. A Reddit App  



To get a Reddit Account, head over to www.reddit.com and click register in the top right:


![My RedditRegister](http://i.imgur.com/XdCS1TL.png =333x200)

Follow the instructions to create your account :

![My RedditRegisterScreen](http://i.imgur.com/6tvC9UX.png =333x200)

After you log in to your account, you need to set up a reddit app. Click the preferences button in the top right:  

![My RedditPreferences](http://i.imgur.com/Pg3wTHi.png)

In preferences click the apps tab:  

![My RedditAppTab](http://i.imgur.com/32gX6rD.png)

Fill out the app information and choose script as the type:  

![My RedditAppComplete](http://i.imgur.com/Hn6D14r.png)

Once your app is created your app-Id and app-secret will show up under the apps tab. These are what you will use to configure the redditbot in config.js:
